title: Zathura
content:
This was a suprisingly good movie... it was kinda slow starting I thought, but after it got going it was action packed... plus the girl was kinda cutie... but I liked it! it was worth the whole 99 cents I spent on it... [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-helmet.gif[/img] ... well I would have spent mor to see it.. but why when you dont have to..._____________________________
[img]http://i32.photobucket.com/albums/d24/TheFarleyBoy/CoolBackGround.jpg[/img]

What Makes A Real Man!

title: Re: Zathura
content: I just checked a trailer, looks pretty nice! At least visually! I'm going to see it. It just makes me think about Keen.. The space looks somehow Keenish.. I want to see a Keen movie some day.. The space would look just like that.. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-drool.gif[/img] Eat your veggies!

title: Re: Zathura
content: Jumanji was a lot better. title: humhum
content: The trailer advertised that this story was written by the same Author as Jumanji... what differences were there, if any?

title: Re: humhum
content: Is it some sequel or something? The story seems ehm.. slightly similar. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] Eat your veggies!

title: Re: Jumanji
content:
It sounds like its the same, but it has a sight different fell to it, and... I think it felt sorter... but its made by the same people... and no its not a sequel to Jumanji... but hey that's my opinion... now heres some questions... what do the words, Jumanji And Zathura mean? I mean are they just made up? anyway.. Guess what you guys! ITS SNOWING!!!!!! Snow makes me happy! and want to go frolicking in it!
